sections.name: Couplet!(1)
lyrics: Stars shining bright above you
Night breezes seem to whisper "I love you"
Birds singin' in the sycamore trees
Dream a little dream of me

sections.name: Couplet!(2)
lyrics: Say "Night-ie night" and kiss me
Just hold me tight and tell me you'll miss me
While I'm alone and blue as can be
Dream a little dream of me

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: Stars fading but I linger on, dear
Still craving your kiss
I'm longing to linger 'til dawn, dear
Just saying this

sections.name: Couplet(1)
lyrics: Sweet dreams 'til sunbeams find you
Sweet dreams that leave all worries behind you
But in your dreams, whatever they be
Dream a little dream of me

sections.name: Solo(2)
lyrics: ***Instru***
